description: A 17-year-old kayaker spent about 12 hours clinging to his kayak after becoming separated from his high school group, according to the U.S. Coast Guard. Coast Guard video shows the moment he was rescued by an off-duty lifeguard who happened to be nearby. NBC News' Maggie Vespa has the story.
title: Teen kayaker rescued after spending 12 hours lost at sea off Hawaii's coast

description: Cuba's main electrical grid has failed, frustrating Cubans across the island, with up to ten million still in the dark. NBC News' George Solis has the latest.
title: Cuba's power grid collapses again, keeping millions in the dark

description: A Pennsylvania woman has been sentenced to two life terms without parole on murder convictions in the deaths of her two young children, who were found hanging in the basement of their home five years ago.
title: Woman sentenced to life in deaths of 2 young kids found hanging in home’s basement

description: After electricity was partially restored in Cuba following an island-wide blackout, the electrical grid collapsed a second time, causing widespread alarm. Journalist Ed Augustin told NBC News that while power is gradually being restored in some areas, millions of people in Cuba are still struggling to stay cool and find food amidst the ongoing outages.
title: Cuba hit with second blackout amid national power grid failure

description: All charges have been dismissed against a deaf Black man with cerebral palsy who was shocked with a Taser and repeatedly punched by Phoenix police officers.
title: Charges dismissed against deaf man with cerebral palsy who was tased and punched by Phoenix police

description: ATLANTA — In the latest public rebuke of Georgia’s controversial 2021 voting law, dozens of Black students and activists marched through the heart of historic Morehouse College on Saturday in an effort to push back on what they call “anti-voting” measures in Georgia and other states.
title: Ga. students take to streets to protest 'dehumanizing' voting law that criminalizes handing out water

description: LEXINGTON, Miss. — Three people were killed and eight others were injured in central Mississippi early Saturday when at least two people opened fire into a group of several hundred people who were celebrating a school’s homecoming football win at an outdoor trail several hours after the game had ended, authorities said.
title: 3 killed and 8 injured by gunfire following a Mississippi school’s football game

description: A five-alarm brush fire in Oakland, California, sparked evacuation orders as it burned two homes on Friday.
title: Oakland Hills fire in California damages 2 homes, sparks evacuations

description: Boeing and its machinists’ union have reached a new contract proposal, the union said Saturday, a deal that could end a more than month-long strike that has hobbled the manufacturers’ production.
title: Boeing workers to vote on new proposal that could end strike

description: In an interview with NBC’s Peter Alexander, Vice President Kamala Harris details how she would distance herself from President Biden, the widening gender gap among voters, why her criticizing President Biden is "not productive," and more.
title: Kamala Harris says it's 'not productive' for her to criticize Biden

description: PHOENIX — Mesa Mayor John Giles, a Republican who supports Kamala Harris for president, is vexed by the disconnect between Arizona’s presidential race and what’s happening down the ballot.
title: Arizona is a top presidential battleground. But the Senate and House races there are taking place in their own universe.

description: More younger women are getting a type of hormone-related breast cancer. Doctors aren’t clear why but early puberty may be a factor.
title: How early puberty may contribute to the rise of breast cancer among younger women

description: ]Kamala Harris is zeroing in on a key group of voters: Republicans and Republican-leaning independents who can’t get themselves to support Donald Trump.
title: Harris focuses on winning over disaffected Republicans as the election draws near

description: A drone was launched towards Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's house in the northern Israel town of Caesarea on Saturday morning, according to the Israeli Prime Minister's office.
title: Drone strike launched from Lebanon towards Netanyahu's house, no casualities reported

description: TUCSON, Ariz. — Former President Barack Obama on Friday contrasted former President Donald Trump’s character to that of the late Sen.
title: Barack Obama contrasts John McCain with Trump at Arizona rally

description: Kamala Harris’ campaign posted a video that appeared to show Donald Trump nodding off at a campaign event Friday, pushing a new line of attack that the former president is too "exhausted" to run for office.
title: Harris' campaign mocks 'exhausted' Trump after he appears to nod off during an event

description: Democratic Sen. Tammy Baldwin and Republican Eric Hovde sparred over abortion rights and economic issues in the Wisconsin Senate debate.
title: Tammy Baldwin and Eric Hovde spar over abortion and the economy in tense Wisconsin Senate debate
